resources.string: North or South of Green Street?

Welcome to Study Buddy!

This app is designed to help you find the best locations for studying on campus at UIUC. You may search for a spot by name or enter your personal study preferences and have Studdy Buddy find the best spots for you!
Study Buddy will then provide you with a list of study spots which match your search criteria. It will also display the closest food location to your spot and the closest coffee shop, as well as whether these places are open or closed.

We hope you enjoy the app, and happy studying!
